= MiCluster-Score-Distribution 1.2 =
Library to create score distribution histograms.

== Maven dependency ==
{{{
  <dependency> 
    <groupId>uk.ac.ebi.enfin.mi.score.distribution</groupId>
    <artifactId>miscoreDistribution</artifactId>
    <version>1.2</version>
  </dependency>
}}}
{{{
  <repository>
     <id>ebi-repo</id>
     <name>EBI repository</name>
     <url>http://www.ebi.ac.uk/~maven/m2repo</url>
  </repository>
  <repository>
     <id>ebi-repo-snapshots</id>
     <name>EBI snapshots repository</name>
     <url>http://www.ebi.ac.uk/~maven/m2repo_snapshots</url>
  </repository>
}}}
<br>

== Example ==
Here two examples of how to create score distribution histograms:
<br>
=== Querying a PSICQUIC database and saving the scores in CSV file: ===
{{{
...
        EncoreMiscoreDistribution mD = new EncoreMiscoreDistribution("MatrixDB");
        mD.createChart();
        mD.saveScores();
...
}}}
=== From a CSV file of scores: ===
{{{
...
        FileMiscoreDistribution mD = new FileMiscoreDistribution("MatrixDB_Scores.txt");
        mD.createChart();
...
}}}
==== Example of the content of a CSV file ====
0.31468466,0.3042728,0.33558023,0.3042728,0.33558023,0.2952445,0.33558023,0.42515436,0.3668876,0.2952445,0.3042728,0.3042728,0.3042728
